alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central; Baldwin Coastal; Conecuh (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 2:48AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Baldwin, Escambia, southeastern Conecuh, southwestern Covington, western Okaloosa, Santa Rosa and Escambia Counties through 400 AM CST... At 248 AM CST, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles southwest of Riverview to 4 miles southwest of Warrington. Movement was northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pensacola, Ferry Pass, Brent, West Pensacola, Ensley, Warrington, Gonzalez, Pace, Milton, Gulf Breeze, Brewton, Orange Beach, Goulding, Century, Flomaton, Bagdad, Lillian, Myrtle Grove, Oriole Beach and Navarre. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CST for south central and southwestern Alabama...and northwestern Florida.
